text: Aziz Mushabber Ahmadi (25 March 1932 â€“ 2 March 2023) was an Indian judge. He was the 26th Chief Justice of India from 1994 to 1997. After serving as a judge in the Gujarat High Court, Ahmadi was appointed judge to the Supreme Court in 1988. He was Chancellor at the Aligarh Muslim University for two terms. Ahmadi died on 2 March 2023, at age 90. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Chief justices of India
title: Aziz Mushabber Ahmadi
